TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextureBrush extends System.Drawing.Brush
Public NotInheritable Class TextureBrush Inherits Brush
public ref class TextureBrush sealed : System::Drawing::Brush

summary.span: 类的每个属性都是 对象，这种对象使用图像来填充形状的内部。

span.span: Each property of the class is a object that uses an image to fill the interior of a shape.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法获取新位图 。The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a new bitmap using the method. 它还演示了 。It also demonstrates a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建一个包含名为 "Button2" 的按钮的窗体。Create a form containing a button named Button2. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并将 Button2_Click 方法与按钮的 `Click` 事件关联。Paste the code into the form and associate the Button2_Click method with the button's `Click` event. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 创建此 对象的一个精确副本。

span.span: Creates an exact copy of this object.

returns.span: 此方法创建的作为 对象转换的 对象。

span.span: The object this method creates, cast as an object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` `Paint` 事件处理程序的参数。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 该代码将创建一个 对象和该纹理画笔的精确副本，然后使用该副本在屏幕上填充一个矩形。The code creates a object and an exact copy of that texture brush, and then uses the copy to fill a rectangle on the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将表示此 对象的局部几何转换的 对象与指定的 对象按指定顺序相乘。

span.span: Multiplies the object that represents the local geometric transformation of this object by the specified object in the specified order.

[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

param.name: matrix
param.span: 要乘以几何转换的 对象。

span.span: The object by which to multiply the geometric transformation.

summary.span: 通过预先计算指定的 对象，将表示此 对象的局部几何转换的 对象与指定 对象相乘。

span.span: Multiplies the object that represents the local geometric transformation of this object by the specified object by prepending the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的转换矩阵 指定如何转换定义纹理的图像。The transformation matrix of a object specifies how the image that defines the texture is transformed. 例如，如果变换矩阵指定了顺时针旋转90度，纹理图像将会顺时针旋转90度。For example, if the transformation matrix specifies a rotation of 90 degrees clockwise, the texture image is rotated by 90 degrees clockwise. ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` `Paint` 事件处理程序的参数。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 创建一个新矩阵，该矩阵指定 x 方向上50个单位的平移。Creates a new matrix that specifies a translation of 50 units in the x-direction. - 将矩阵与纹理画笔的变换矩阵相乘。Multiplies the matrix with the transformation matrix of the texture brush. - 使用纹理画笔填充矩形。Fills a rectangle, using the texture brush. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

param.span: 要乘以几何转换的 对象。

span.span: The object by which to multiply the geometric transformation.

param.name: order
param.span: 用于指定两个矩阵相乘的顺序的 枚举。

span.span: A enumeration that specifies the order in which to multiply the two matrices.

summary.span: 将表示此 对象的局部几何转换的 对象与指定的 对象按指定顺序相乘。

span.span: Multiplies the object that represents the local geometric transformation of this object by the specified object in the specified order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的转换矩阵 指定如何转换定义纹理的图像。The transformation matrix of a object specifies how the image that defines the texture is transformed. 例如，如果变换矩阵指定了顺时针旋转90度，纹理图像将会顺时针旋转90度。For example, if the transformation matrix specifies a rotation of 90 degrees clockwise, the texture image is rotated by 90 degrees clockwise. ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` `Paint` 事件处理程序的参数。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 创建一个新矩阵，该矩阵指定 x 方向上50个单位的平移。Creates a new matrix that specifies a translation of 50 units in the x-direction. - 将矩阵与纹理画笔的变换矩阵相乘。Multiplies the matrix with the transformation matrix of the texture brush. - 使用纹理画笔填充矩形。Fills a rectangle, using the texture brush. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 将此 对象的 属性重置为标识。

span.span: Resets the property of this object to identity.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` `Paint` 事件处理程序的参数。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 将纹理图像旋转90度。Rotates the texture image by 90 degrees. - 填充矩形。Fills a rectangle. - 将变换矩阵重置为标识。Resets the transformation matrix to identity. - 填充第二个矩形。Fills a second rectangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicTextureBrushExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要作为 `e` `Paint` 事件处理程序的参数。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 在 x 方向上将纹理图像缩小两倍。Scales the texture image by two times in the x-direction. - 使用纹理画笔在屏幕上填充矩形。Fills a rectangle on the screen, using the texture brush. summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的副本，该对象为与此 对象关联的图像定义局部几何变换。

span.span: Gets or sets a copy of the object that defines a local geometric transformation for the image associated with this object.

value.span: 用于定义几何变换的 对象的副本，该变换仅适用于通过此 对象绘制的填充。

span.span: A copy of the object that defines a geometric transformation that applies only to fills drawn by using this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 几何转换可用于平移、缩放、旋转或倾斜定义此画笔纹理的图像。A geometric transformation can be used to translate, scale, rotate, or skew the image that defines the texture of this brush. 由于由属性返回的矩阵 是画笔几何转换的副本，因此，当您不再需要矩阵时，您应该释放它。Because the matrix returned and by the property is a copy of the brush's geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.

summary.span: 按指定顺序将此 对象的局部几何转换平移指定的尺寸。

span.span: Translates the local geometric transformation of this object by the specified dimensions in the specified order.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法获取新位图 。The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a new bitmap using the method. 它还演示 属性和 枚举。It also demonstrates the property and the enumeration. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建一个包含名为 "Button2" 的按钮的窗体。Create a form containing a button named Button2. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并将 Button2_Click 方法与按钮的 `Click` 事件关联。Paste the code into the form and associate the Button2_Click method with the button's `Click` event. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]
